name: Cheers
long_description: Cheers is the category leader in Frontline Experience Management. Thousands of frontline employees use Cheers to unify payments, tips, reviews, and referrals in one frictionless flow. By removing friction using NFC, Cheers drives 5â€“10x more reviews, referrals, and tips, boosting 5-star ratings and revenue. With enterprise customers already on board and strong traction, Cheers is redefining how frontline teams deliver bottom-line impact.
